org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity This package contains classes used in the implementation model for the BPEL activities.

Uses of IAeFaultHandler in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support
 

Classes in org.activebpel.rt.bpel.impl.activity.support that implement IAeFaultHandler
 class AeDefaultFaultHandler
          Implementation of CatchAll fault handler.
 class AeFaultHandler
          Models the catch and catchAll providing a place to store the child activity for the fault.
 class AeImplicitFaultHandler
          Implements the implicit fault handling routine which is simply to run the default compensation routine followed by rethrowing of the fault.

          Impl of fault handler for WS-BPEL 2.0
